mapper.select: SELECT id,activityId,lotteryId,val1,description,status,createTime, (select a.name from uc_lottery_activity a where a.id=z.activityId) as activityName, (select b.name from uc_lottery b where b.id=z.lotteryId) as lotteryName, (select c.image from uc_lottery c where c.id=z.lotteryId) as lotteryImage, lastTime from uc_lottery_activityprize z where id=#{id}
